member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.RoutingHelpers.Template(System.String[])
member.summary: Helper method that play well with the string interpolation feature. It inverts the behavior of the Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing system. If it receives a string surrounded by '[' and ']' (instead of '{' and '}') it will take it as a static segment. In oppossition, it will take every string outside '[' and ']' as a segment variable and properly surround it with '{' and '}' characters. It will also add a leading '/' in case it doesn't exists.
